title: Where should I meet my delivery partner?
description: In most cases, the delivery partner will bring your order right to your door. If you're having trouble finding them, check their location on the map.
- If your address is difficult to get to, it may be faster and easier if you meet your delivery partner outside
- You can include special delivery instructions before confirming your order
- Reaching out to your delivery partner is the best way to coordinate an exact drop-off spot if you aren't sure where it will be.
- Keep in mind that your delivery partner may be driving. For safety, they may not be available to answer the phone or write a message
